channel.title: Mailchimp on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Mailchimp on Damien Saunders

item.title: Mailchimp makes e-mail marketing easy
item.description: ** Mailchimp** makes **e-mail marketing** easy - this Practical Guide will show you a process to follow to send your first e-mail marketing campaign. This Practical Guide will help you to understand lists, campaigns, templates and more … My latest presentation is for anyone who has already decided to use Mailchimp.
